name: Blade, Arrow & Magic
description:
The game "Blade, Arrow and Magic" allows you to play as three different characters, a magician, a knight and an archer, in a strategic card game based on the famous "rock, paper, scissors" game. You can face an artificial intelligence to test your skills and strategy.

The rules are:

Paladin>Archer                Archer>Magician               Magician>Paladin
